msIdentifier.collection: General Court of the Western Shore (Judgment Record)

org.orgName: Maryland. General Court of the Western Shore

div2.p: Be it remembered that heretofore to wit, on the twentieth day of March in the year of our Lord one thousand seven hundred and ninety two; Jenny Shorter by Gabriel Duvall his attorney preferred and filed in the General Court here her petition for Freedom against Eleanor Bradford which is in form following to wit.

To the honourable the Judges of the General Court. The Petition of Jenny Shorter Humbly sheweth that she is held in slavery by Eleanor Bradford of Prince Georges County, and she is advised that she is entitled to her freedom, being descended in the female Line from a free white woman named Elizabeth Shorter she therefore prays your honours the premises being considered, that she may be liberated from the Custody of the said Eleanor Bradford and she as in duty bound will pray & soforth.
Whereupon in pursuance of the rule of the Court here in such cases made
